## Epifunction : sapplyVerifySpelling 

This document show examples of epiFunction use
```{r, config, echo = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
sites <- c("Italy","Spain","Bretagne","Germany","Hospital A","Italy")

```

We use a correct list of sites to compare incorrectly spelled values

```{r, verifySpelling , echo = TRUE}

SiteNames <- c("Italy","Spain","Germany")

sapplyVerifySpelling(sites, SiteNames)

```

We can use verifySpelling with only one string value
```{r, addColumn , echo = TRUE}

sapplyVerifySpelling("italy", SiteNames)
```
